page.title: 16POPULATION (2)
page.content: The{Holywell Bay Old People's Home}was converted from a hotel in November l984 to a home for old people. There are 30 residents including 2 married couples, 3 sisters, 6 men and the remainder women. The oldest resident is 93 and there is no one younger than 70. There are l4 staff. Most residents have moved to Holywell Bay from their own homes, mostly in Cornwall, the furthest coming from Redruth about 20 miles away. The weekly rates are from Â£ll0 - Â£l50 depending on the accommodation requirements of each person. Because prices vary there are no extra fees at all. Individual needs such as diabetic and vegetarian are also catered for.
